data.title: Austrian-Inspired Luxury Mountain Resort in Stowe, VT
data.meta_description: Choose the ultimate in mountain luxury when you book a stay at Trapp Family Lodge, our resort in Stowe, Vermont, where adventure awaits.
data.text:
The LodgeExperience Austrian-Inspired Vermont Lodging

European-style accommodations meet the beauty of the Stowe, Vermont, area at Trapp Family Lodge. Our vacation resort sits on 2,600 acres with stunning mountain views during any season.

Our Real-EstateOwn A Piece of the Trapp Family Lodge

Create a long-term destination for you and your family right here at Trapp Family Lodge. We offer three vacation home options on the property, each with all the amenities and activities of the main lodge.
